sentences.english: Pectins are composed of a galactose derivative, chitin of a glucose derivative.
sentences.chinese: 果膠是由半乳糖變異體和葡萄糖變異體角素構成。

sentences.english: Talk to your dietitian about other lactose-reduced products.
sentences.chinese: 向你的營養師其他的一些乳糖較少的產品。

sentences.english: Feeding babies with a so-called lactose allergy soy milk is an absolute disaster.
sentences.chinese: 用乳糖過敏豆奶來餵養嬰兒絕對是一個災難。

sentences.english: Sweden has one of the world's highest percentages of lactase tolerant people.
sentences.chinese: 其中瑞典爲乳糖耐受性比例最高的國家。

sentences.english: I'm a no frills kind of gal.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個沒有低價種半乳糖。

sentences.english: Lactose is also identified as the best carbon source while asparagine the best nitrogen source.
sentences.chinese: 同時確定了乳糖爲最佳碳源，天門冬素爲最佳氮源。

sentences.english: People who are lactose intolerant or have a milk allergy.
sentences.chinese: 有乳糖不耐症和牛奶過敏的人。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of lactose-free formula in treatment of infantile autumn diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察無乳糖奶粉對嬰兒秋季腹瀉的輔助治療作用。

sentences.english: Alkaline pectinases break down complex pectin into simple molecules like galacturonic acids.
sentences.chinese: 鹼性果膠酶分解複雜的果膠成小分子如半乳糖醛酸。

sentences.english: Lactose might be an ideal inducer for the expression of recombinant protein.
sentences.chinese: 乳糖可以作爲基因工程重組蛋白的理想誘導劑。

sentences.english: Lactose is also not present in soy-based formulas.
sentences.chinese: 乳糖是今朝還沒有在年夜豆爲根底的公式。

sentences.english: The presence of gluten or lactose should clearly be mentioned on the label.
sentences.chinese: 在麪筋或乳糖存在應清楚地提及在標籤上。

sentences.english: Lactose and galactose could inhibit the haemagglutination activity of snail agglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 其凝集活性能被半乳糖和乳糖抑制。

sentences.english: Lactose and galactose could inhibit the haemagglutination activity of snail agglutinin.
sentences.chinese: 其凝集活性能被半乳糖和乳糖抑制。

sentences.english: Selective acetylation of tri-O-acetyl-C-aryl-D-gluco-and galacto-pyranosides was reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了葡萄糖和半乳糖碳苷的選擇性乙酰化。
